div.p: This code system http://www.cms.gov/Medicare/Coding/HCPCSReleaseCodeSets defines many codes, but they are not represented here

description.value: HCPCS procedure codes and modifiers are submitted by providers to payers to convey the specific procedure performed. HCPCS codes are available at http://www.cms.gov/Medicare/Coding/HCPCSReleaseCodeSets.

copyright.value: HCPCS Level II Alphanumeric Codes are maintained by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) and are available for public use. As HL7 is working with the owning authority to finalize the url, this url is subject to change.
